mapper.insert: INSERT INTO approver ( id, approvalId, employeeId, orders, submitYn, submitDate, regDate ) VALUES (APPROVER_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{approvalId}, #{employeeId}, #{orders}, #{submitYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{submitDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM approver WHERE approvalId = #{approvalId} AND submitYn is null ORDER BY orders
SELECT ap.*, e.name AS name, j.name AS jobName FROM approver ap JOIN employee e ON ap.employeeId = e.id JOIN job j ON e.jobId = j.id WHERE ap.approvalId = #{approvalId} ORDER BY ap.orders
